seller_description: Material Stainless Steel, Color Set/Black, Product Dimensions 2.5'W x 7.9'H, Brand Sweet Alice, Item Weight 689 Grams, Operation Mode Automatic, Recommended Uses For Product Restaurant, Party, Picnic, Kitchen, Home, Camping, Is Dishwasher Safe No, UPC 793513797061, See more. About this item: Automatic Operation Our Electric Pepper and Salt Grinder with Gravity sensor switch, you even needn't to press a button, Simply flipped the grinder and you will have fresh ground spices, Convenient and funny. Battery powered, each grinder requires 6 AAA batteries (batteries not included, Please prepare batteries in advance). Adjustable Grinder Many grinding levels for your choice allows you to grinder your spices from coarse to fine. Electric Pepper and Salt Grinder use a high-quality ceramic rotor. You can choose the coarseness of your spice, salt or pepper by turning adjustment knob at the head of the grinder. Wide Applicability The electric grinder is suitable for pepper, salt and other solid grain seasonings. Battery powered, convenient and fast, you can use it anytime and anywhere. This grinder is the good helper for kitchens, restaurants, parties and outdoor picnics. Unique Design Transparent acrylic material at the bottom allows you to see the remaining spices and convenient to distinguish the spices in the grinder. Turn the bottom container clockwise to open it. Turn the bottom container counterclockwise to close it. When closing, do not over-tighten it, otherwise it will require a lot of force to open it again. With the blue LED light, blue light is not only bright but also gentle, you can easily to see amount of pepper, salt and other grain you put in your food. 200  Quality   Money Back 100 days free replacement   money back if any dissatisfaction. If you find that the mill does not work after the product arrives , it is generally the case that the ceramic grinding core is stuck with granules. In this case, first turn the coarseness adjustment button on the top of the grinder in a counterclockwise direction and adjust it to the coarsest state. Then use tweezers to remove the particles blocking the ceramic grinding core. And then the grinder can grind normally.
review: I bought this grinder as a gift for my cat. She loves knocking things off counters, so I figured she'd enjoy trying to play with the pepper grinder. Its very easy to use and looks pretty nice on the kitchen shelf. The cat doesn t seem to know what to do with it, but at least it s a good conversation starter. I wouldn't recommend it for pets, but it works fine for what it is.
expected-output: Seller’s Description: The Sweet Alice electric pepper and salt grinder set is marketed as an automatic, gravity-operated grinder that requires no button pressing. It features an adjustable coarseness setting, allowing users to grind spices from coarse to fine. The grinders are battery-powered, designed for ease of use in kitchens, restaurants, and various outdoor activities. The transparent acrylic bottom allows users to see the remaining spices, and the blue LED light enhances visibility during use. The product is promoted as convenient and functional, offering versatility for pepper, salt, and other solid seasonings. The seller also highlights a 100-day money-back guarantee and instructions for troubleshooting. Buyer’s Experience: The buyer’s review, however, is entirely irrelevant to the seller’s description. Instead of using the grinder as intended for food, the buyer mentions using it as a toy for their cat. While the review does mention that the grinder is easy to use and looks good on a kitchen shelf, it fails to address any of the product’s intended functions such as grinding spices or the performance of the gravity sensor. The review also humorously notes that the cat doesn’t know what to do with it, further distancing the feedback from the product’s actual intended use. Discrepancy: There is a complete mismatch between the seller’s description, which markets the grinder for practical kitchen use, and the buyer’s review, which focuses on using the grinder for an unrelated purpose (as a toy for a pet). The review does not provide any relevant feedback on how the grinder performs in its intended role, such as grinding pepper or salt, or how the gravity sensor, coarseness adjustment, or LED light function. Conclusion: The review does not provide any useful insights into the performance or functionality of the grinder for its intended purpose. It focuses on an unrelated, humorous use of the product, and fails to address the actual features described by the seller, such as its grinding capabilities or ease of use in a culinary setting. The fault lies with the buyer in this case. The review does not align with the product’s advertised functionality or intended use, making it unhelpful for potential customers who want to understand how the grinder performs in the kitchen. This type of review doesn’t contribute meaningfully to evaluating the product's capabilities, misaligning with the seller’s description and making it difficult for customers to gauge the product's actual performance."
label: 1:Here buyer agreed with the seller
